About Me

my resume

BIO

Junior Java Developer / Architect / Jee | Angular, I master the implementation in these areas both front-end and back-end. As far as back-end development is concerned, I have already realized several projects using several JEE frameworks, starting with the JEE core APIs (EJB, JPA, ...) and the new frameworks (Spring, Hibernate ... ). I also did PHP development using Laravel. in front-end, I developed SPA, using frameworks like Angular and other libraries like jQuery, Bootstrap ... Other skills I acquired are: Unix / Linux scripting, CVS system control version / Git, Oracle / MySQL / PostgreSQL databases, Maven build tools, Tomcat web container, Apache web server ...

PFE internship at LYDEC :

Java / J2ee Full Stack Developer, Angular 5

Topic: WEB application "Occupational health and safety management" Mission: conception and realization of the application Technologies: Spring Boot, Angular 5 ...

Engineering Internship at the Meteorological Direction :

Full Stack Developer

Subject: Implementation of an application for consulting meteorological messages for the various stations of the network. Mission: conception and realization of the application Technologies: PHP, Javascript ...

Internship initiation at ONEE :

Observation

Subject: Renovation study braking system and uprising main groups of Bin El Ouidane factory.
